email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of October 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider something in the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s specifications and any additional terms? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per ton, which is competitive given the current market. The MV Ocean Star is fully compliant with all regulations and has a clean inspection record. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.75 per ton is acceptable. Can we confirm the laycan as October 15-20 and the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full vessel details and any additional documentation required. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the terms are acceptable. I’ve attached the full vessel details and the draft contract for your review. The laycan is confirmed as October 15-20, and demurrage is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if you need any further clarifications. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the documents. Everything looks in order. We’ll proceed with the contract as discussed. Please confirm the final freight rate of $48.75 per ton and the laycan dates. Once confirmed, we’ll sign and return the contract. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed—freight rate is $48.75 per ton, and the laycan is October 15-20. I’ll mark the vessel as fixed and await the signed contract. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah.
